summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 KOMFORT SATELLITE TRAILER S299RB.  THE CONTACT INSPECTED THE VEHICLE AND OBSERVED A DEFECT CONTRIBUTED TO A MANUFACTURER DESIGN OF THE TRAILER HITCH FRAME.  THE FRAME EXHIBITED A WEAK GROUND IN THE STRUCTURE.  THE CONTACT HAD CONCERN OF THE POTENTIAL SAFETY HAZARD.  THE VIN WAS UNAVAILABLE.
